meanings.definition: The act of traveling frequently or widely around the world.
meanings.sent1: Her globetrotting adventures took her to many countries.
meanings.sent2: He dreams of globetrotting and exploring new cultures.
meanings.sent3: The globetrotting explorer always had a new stamp in her passport.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a globe, constantly globetrotting to distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of globetrotting filled her with wanderlust.

meanings.definition: A person who travels frequently or widely around the world.
meanings.sent1: The globetrotting journalist reported from various countries.
meanings.sent2: She met a globetrotting photographer who had seen it all.
meanings.sent3: The globetrotting enthusiast had a collection of souvenirs from every corner of the world.
meanings.sent4: His heart belonged to the road, a true globetrotting soul.
meanings.sent5: The globetrotting nomad lived out of a backpack, always on the move.
